instruction: List three historical figures connected to the given country.
output: Three historical figures connected to Japan are Emperor Meiji, Akihito, and Emperor Hirohito. Emperor Meiji was credited with transforming Japan from a feudal society into a modern nation state in the late 19th century. Akihito was the Emperor of Japan from 1989 to 2019, and Emperor Hirohito was his father who served as the Emperor of Japan from 1926 to 1989.
